name: Lucid Drifter
description:
Fly, drift and whack to KEEP THE DREAM ALIVE in this unorthodox arcade/racing hydrid(?) game(???), made for Ludum Dare 46! NOTE: Game currently does not end.

Polish and Content Updates to come (after the voting period)

Controls:
Mouse2/A/B: Charge/drift
Mouse1/X/Y: Whack
Select/Tab: Toggle steering mode
Escape: Quit game

  • Gameplay/spritework- @taxiderby
  • Environments - @daisyowl
  • Audio - @cherof, @wheel_able

Tools used: Ferr2D Terrain Editor, Super Text Mesh

Bug Fixes:

  • Fixed some wall colliders being too thin and thus easy to clip through
  • Fixed tutorial incorrectly listing "Mouse1" as the drift button
  • Fixed issue where stage backgrounds wouldn't loop properly
  • Fixed issue where stage would occasionally break or become invisible after dying
  • Default steering mode set to rotational
  • Fixed most visuals not displaying on Mac
  • Restored various window resolution support
  • Fixed minor issue where the control mode indicator wouldn't fully fade out after being toggled
